themes: collaboration between state, civil society, and artists
key_phrases: funding program for artists to do their work in a total free way
pay back by providing free classes/workshops to Austin residents
win-win situation for artists and the public
model of Mexico for 'Fondo Nacional para la Cultura y las Artes' (FONCA)
proven fantastic way to both support artists and promote art education
combine the efforts and resources of the State, civil society, and the artistic community
mentioned_programs: Fondo Nacional para la Cultura y las Artes
solutions_proposed: Create a funding program that allows artists to work freely and 'pay back' by offering free classes or workshops to residents
Adopt a model similar to Mexico's FONCA, combining efforts of the state, civil society, and artists to incentivize high-quality artistic and cultural production
